verses.verse: I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice.<s%> To <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, I will sing <S%H2167>praises.<s%>

I will be <S%H7919>careful<s%> to live a <S%H8549>blameless<s%> <S%H1870>life.<s%> When will you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1980>me?<s%> I will walk <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> with a <S%H8537>blameless<s%> <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

I will <S%H7896>set<s%> no <S%H1100>vile<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> before my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> I <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6213>deeds<s%> of <S%H7750>faithless<s%> <S%H1692>men.<s%> They will not cling to me.
A <S%H6141>perverse<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> will be <S%H5493>far<s%> from <S%H3045>me.<s%> I will have nothing to do with <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

I will <S%H6789>silence<s%> whoever <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H3960>slanders<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> I <S%H3201>won't<s%> tolerate one who <S%H5869>is<s%> <S%H1362>haughty<s%> <S%H3824>and<s%> <S%H7342>conceited.<s%>

My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will be on the <S%H539>faithful<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H1980>me.<s%> He who walks in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> he will serve <S%H8334>me.<s%>

He who <S%H6213>practices<s%> <S%H7423>deceit<s%> <S%H3427>won't<s%> dwell <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house.<s%> He who <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> <S%H3559>won't<s%> be established before my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H1242>Morning<s%> by <S%H6789>morning,<s%> I will destroy all the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5892>city.<s%>
